definition[0]_en: A track configuration in which the audio track is located in the centre of a separate film roll.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A track configuration in which the audio track is located in the centre of a separate film roll.

definition[0]_en: A track configuration in which the audio track is located near the edge of a film roll.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A track configuration in which the audio track is located near the edge of a film roll.
